item.description:
Many of you have had the great pleasure of meeting George S at happy hour, movie night, or other NHC events.  Well the time has come for George to move on now, work and family and such draw him away from New Haven.  But before he goes, he'll be having dinner at Prime 16 on Wednesday Night around 8pm and would love for anyone to join him.

So if you'd like a good chance to say goodbye, join George at Prime!  He'll post his contact info later on tonight, and will be making a reservation once RSVP's close around 4 pm.

Since George is making a reservation, please try not to No Show or "Maybe", thanks.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for / Contact George, he plans to make a reservation at RSVP close.
item.name: Farwell to George Dinner
